tool_description: Neural Translate. 110+ Langs. HTML/Text/JSON. Protected words. Multiple target langs in single request.
title: NLP Translation

api_list.name: JSON Data Translate
api_list.description: Translate values inside JSON formatted string with **protected keys** and **protected words** capabilities

body.original_json:
{"name":{"firstName":"George","lastName":"Bush"},"age":30,"Address":null,"cities":[{"code":"NYC","name":"New York City","state":"New York","lat":40.73061,"long":-73.935242,"description":"

New York City (NYC), often called New York (NY), is the most populous city in the United States. With an estimated 2019 population of 8,336,817 distributed over about 302.6 square miles (784 km2), New York is also the most densely populated major city in the United States.

"},{"code":"LA","name":"City of Los Angeles","state":"California","lat":34.05,"long":-118.25,"description":"

Los Angeles (lɔːs ˈændʒələs); Spanish: Los Ángeles; Spanish for 'The Angels'), officially the City of Los Angeles and often known by its initials L.A., is the largest city in California. With an estimated population of nearly four million people, it is the second-most populous city in the United States (after New York City) and the third-most populous city in North America (after Mexico City and New York City).

"}]}

translated_json.es:
{"name":{"firstName":"George","lastName":"Bush"},"age":30,"Address":null,"cities":[{"code":"NYC","name":"New York Ciudad","state":"New York","lat":40.73061,"long":-73.935242,"description":"

New York City (NYC), a menudo llamada New York (NY), es la ciudad más poblada de los Estados Unidos. Con una población estimada en 2019 de 8,336,817 distribuida en aproximadamente 302.6 millas cuadradas (784 km2), New York es también la ciudad principal más densamente poblada de los Estados Unidos.

"},{"code":"LA","name":"Ciudad de Los Angeles","state":"California","lat":34.05,"long":-118.25,"description":"

Los Angeles (lɔːs ˈændʒələs); Español: Los Ángeles; Español para 'Los Ángeles'), oficialmente la ciudad de Los Angeles y a menudo conocida por sus iniciales LA, es la ciudad más grande de California. Con una población estimada de casi cuatro millones de personas, es la segunda ciudad más poblada de los Estados Unidos (después de New York City) y la tercera ciudad más poblada de América del Norte (después de la Ciudad de México y New York City).

"}]}
